title: Bitcoin Soars 32% in 2025 Amid Regulatory Tailwinds
summary: Bitcoin has risen nearly 32% so far in 2025, driven by regulatory optimism and sustained interest from institutional investors.

title: CFTC May Allow Spot Crypto Contracts Trading
summary: The CFTC confirmed plans to enable trading of spot crypto asset contracts on registered platforms, boosting regulatory clarity.

title: Ethereum Breaks $4,000 Milestone
summary: Ethereum crossed $4,000 for the first time in 2025, signaling renewed bullish momentum in the altcoin markets.

title: Metaplanet Launches $3.7B Bitcoin Accumulation Strategy
summary: Metaplanet received shareholder approval for a $3.7B capital raise aimed at implementing a massive Bitcoin accumulation strategy.

title: Crypto Thefts Hit $163M in August
summary: Hacking losses reached $163 million in August, marking a 15% month-over-month increase in crypto-related security incidents.

title: Argentina’s $LIBRA Meme Coin Scandal Shakes Markets
summary: Argentina's $LIBRA memecoin surged after presidential promotion, then collapsed—triggering allegations of rug-pull and $250M investor losses.
